item.description: Come out in Southern NH and have a beer or a glass of wine and discuss a book. Our book choices range from fiction, nonfiction, biography, history, and everything in between.  Anyone who loves to read, relax, and socialize with great people is welcome to join. We'll generally keep the RSVPs to 12 people to keep the group manageable and allow everyone to get into the discussion. Looking forward to meeting our new members.
item.name: The Southern NH Books and Brew Club
